content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe groups carrying water and steam
- Connected to electricity network (id=9538) powering various entities

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex
Multiple mining and smelting stations:
1. First station:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Storage chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5)
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)

2. Second station:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Storage chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5)
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)

### Coal Mining System
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Storage chest at (41.5, -80.5)
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Automation Science Pack Production Line
- Input storage chest at (5.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5)
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Output burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5)
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Connected by belt groups for material transport
- Research lab connected to electricity network

# ERROR TIPS

### Resource Extraction Errors
- Ensure storage chests contain the required items before attempting extraction
- Verify the correct chest positions when trying to extract items

### Fuel Management Errors
- Keep track of coal inventory before attempting to insert fuel
- Maintain adequate coal supply for all burner entities
- Consider implementing a fuel distribution priority system

### Production Line Issues
- Monitor ingredient levels in assembling machines
- Ensure consistent supply of raw materials (copper plates, iron gear wheels)
- Verify all components of production chains are properly fueled and connected

### Inventory Management
- Implement inventory checks before attempting item transfers
- Maintain minimum resource thresholds for critical materials
- Monitor storage chest contents regularly

### Power System Management
- Keep boilers fueled to maintain consistent power supply
- Monitor steam engine status and efficiency
- Ensure proper fluid flow through the power generation system
